title: Marketing Assistant: Email Design, Social Media & CRM
job_overview:
Part-Time Virtual Assistant: Email Marketing, Social Media & Graphic Design
Remote | $3–$6 USD/hour | Long-Term Growth

About Us
We’re a small, friendly team of two based in Houston, TX, and we’re looking for our very first virtual assistant! Our mission is to help awesome businesses grow by making marketing simple, smart, and fun—no confusing jargon, no shady tactics, just real results and real connection.

Our Core Values
We believe in Radical Transparency, Client-First Mindset, Innovation Over Imitation, and Growth Through Honest Feedback. We own our wins and mistakes together, always put our clients first, and love learning new things. If you value clear, honest communication and want to be part of a team that supports your growth, you’ll fit right in.

Who We’re Looking For
You’re creative, organized, and excited to help businesses succeed. You love designing emails and creating social media graphics that get attention. You can follow SOPs, communicate clearly, and pay attention to details. You’re not afraid to learn new tools or ask questions.

What You’ll Do
You’ll design and schedule engaging email campaigns, making sure they land in the inbox and look great. You’ll create graphics for both email and social media using platforms like Adobe Express, Canva, or Figma. You’ll help schedule social posts and support basic DM automations. Most communication will be async via Slack or Upgrade to see actual info, but we’ll check in together on Google Meet a few times, especially during your first few weeks, and a video interview via Google Meet is required as part of the hiring process.
You don’t need to overlap with our schedule (Central Standard Time, Houston), as long as your tasks are done on time and you’re available for occasional meetings. We care about results, not hours on the clock.
If you’re not familiar with email deliverability or with tools (like GoHighLevel, TapMango, or Notion), don’t worry—we’ll provide training through SOPs and YouTube resources. The only must-have is experience designing emails in a platform like Adobe Express, Canva, or Figma.

Requirements
Experience designing marketing emails (samples required)
Proficiency with at least one design tool: Adobe Express, Canva, or Figma
Good written and spoken English
Organized, detail-oriented, and reliable
Comfortable with Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, etc.)
Willingness to learn new platforms

Nice-to-Haves
Experience with GoHighLevel, TapMango, or Notion
Previous remote or agency work

Compensation and Growth
$3–$6 USD/hour depending on experience
Please state your desired hourly rate in your application
Part-time (4–6 hours/day), with room to grow into full-time or management
100% remote, long-term position

How to Apply
Please follow these steps CAREFULLY; attention to detail matters to us!
Use the subject line: “I am your next Rockstar VA – [Your Name]”
Use a minimum of 6 Apply Points for your application.
Take the free DISC test  and share your results 
Attach or link to your best email design samples.
In 2–3 sentences, tell us why you’d love this job and which of our values you connect with most.
State your expected hourly rate in USD.
Include a funny Upgrade to see actual info or GIF in your application (photo or gif format is fine).
 (We’re all about getting work done, but that doesn’t mean we can’t have fun!)
If you’re shortlisted, you’ll receive a small paid task and be invited to a video interview via Google Meet.

 We respect your time: You’ll hear back from us within 24 hours of your application.

Why Join Us?
Supportive, transparent team
Clear training and SOPs
Flexible schedule—work when you’re most productive
Real growth opportunities
A culture that values learning, honesty, and teamwork

Ready? Apply now—we can’t wait to meet our first superstar VA!
